title: Stupid fun with fax machines
html:
Random Stuff Sent From Your Fax Machine

Fax something interesting to 1-510-545-0990

Source: Fax Toy - Random Stuff You Fax To Us

It's fun to fax anonymously! And it's fun to have yet another opportunity for meta. First person to fax their ass from the Christmas party loses.
body:
Random Stuff Sent From Your Fax Machine
Fax something interesting to 1-510-545-0990
Source: Fax Toy - Random Stuff You Fax To Us It's fun to fax anonymously! And it's fun to have [yet another opportunity for meta][meta]. First person to fax their ass from the Christmas party loses. [meta]: http://faxtoy.net/page/fax-iBwDqh
